feed.title: Security Advisory for .NET packages hosted at the NuGet Gallery
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for .NET packages hosted at the NuGet Gallery on GitHub

entry.title: [Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.win-x86] .NET Core & .NET Framework Denial of Service Vulnerability
entry.content:
A denial of service vulnerability exists when .NET Core or .NET Framework improperly handles web requests, aka '.NET Core & .NET Framework Denial of Service Vulnerability'.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-1108
  • https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2020-1108
  • https://github.com/dotnet/announcements/issues/157
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3w5p-jhp5-c29q

entry.title: [Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.win-x86] ASP.NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability
entry.content:
A denial of service vulnerability exists when ASP.NET Core improperly handles web requests, aka 'ASP.NET Core Denial of Service Vulnerability'.
